views.markdown:
- Support for Electra (11.x) - Not install network-cmds on iOS11+ - Not require network-cmds for iOS11+ so that it will not overwrite /usr/sbin/rtadvd with a version that doesn't support Electra thereby breaking installations of TetherMe's Electra Beta (Electra support not yet added in this version, still beta - beta available on TetherMe beta repo) * Add Spanish localization

* Full support for iOS 10
* Fixed APN editing for iOS 10
- Add option to hide Blue Tethering Bar
- Update for iOS 9.3+
- Added an option to share any VPN currently connected.
- Will now give error if you try to enable tethering via an interface that is not available.
- Automatically disables then re-enables tethering when switching between data sources if tethering is enabled.
- Added Localization (currently only English, Chinese, and Norwegian).
- Fixed issues with APN editing on iOS9+ * Added an option to override source to IKEv2 tunnels
* Updated compatibility with iOS9.
* NOTE: iOS9 is blocking APN changes. This will be fixed in the next update but this update was pushed to correct the issue that caused some app crashes when TetherMe was installed.
- Removed some logging that could conflict with FTP sessions - Corrected an issue that could cause tethering not to work for some MVNOs
